attributes.action: Better Support for Adults with High-Functioning Autism and Asperger Syndrome
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please give all adults who suffer with all spectrums of autism a chance to lead a better life - Let's get all sufferers of autistic people on the NHS system so we know how many sufferers there are in the UK. Also, let's get better community care for autistic people. Also, we need to do more medical research into the condition. Also, sufferers need to be diagnosed at a early stage in life, instead of being diagnosed later on in there life.
